entry.title: Re: No search strategy could be found in Stock Transport...
entry.content: Use the Manage Your Solution → configure Your Solution app and search for Batch Management SSCUIs. Check which SSCUIs are available in your tenant for batch determination (e.g., strategy types, search procedures). If the SSCUI for Batch Search Strategy is available, configure it for your required application area which is MM and link it to the relevant process (movement type 641 for STO). If the SSCUI is not available, rely on SAP’s delivered scope item 1M0 – Batch Management. In this case, batch determination uses SAP’s predefined strategies, and any custom logic must be handled via BRF+ rules or Custom Fields & Logic.

entry.title: 2H 2025 Release Highlights: The New Enhancements in SAP SuccessFactors Career and Talent Development
entry.content:
The second half of 2025 brings continuous enhancements for SAP SuccessFactors Career and Talent Development. With the 2H 2025 Release, SAP advances its journey toward intelligent, skills-first, and people-centric HR. This release is not just about new features—it’s about empowering organizations to build agile, future-ready workforces through smarter insights, streamlined workflows, and AI-driven personalization.

Here are the highlights of the standout innovations and how they translate into real business value.

AI-Assisted Successor Recommendations: Smarter Succession Planning

Succession planning has long been a strategic imperative, but the 2H 2025 Release takes it to the next level with AI-assisted successor recommendations. Leveraging generative AI, the users can view up to 10 potential successors for a role, ranked by suitability based on:

  • Skills and competencies from the growth portfolio
  • Job roles and profiles from job profile builder
  • Internal and external work experience

Each recommendation includes a rationale, showing matched vs. unmatched skills, and readiness indicators. This not only accelerates decision-making but also reduces bias and improves transparency in talent pipelines.

Assisted successor recommendation in the succession org chart view

Skills-Based Development Goals: Aligning Growth with Strategy

The 2H 2025 Release introduces skills-based recommendations and actions directly into development goals. Powered by SAP Business AI, managers and employees receive contextual suggestions for growth areas, learning activities, and career moves based on current role, target role, or skills and attributes.

  • Empower employees to take charge of their professional growth by presenting them with tailored, skills-based opportunities that align with their development goals.
  • Streamline the process of tracking progress by linking relevant assignments directly to development goals.
  • Enhance the relevance of learning experiences by recommending opportunities that are specifically aligned with individuals’ development objectives, fostering a more engaged and skilled workforce.

Contextual suggestions of opportunities to grow

Role and Interest-based Goal Creation

The 2H Release enables employees to generate AI-driven development goals using selected role or interests. Employees can now personalize development goals by leveraging their role, skill gaps, and interests, enabling more relevant and targeted growth plans.

Role and interest-based goal creation

Opportunity Marketplace: Improved Assignments Experience

Internal mobility gets a major upgrade with improved workflow and configuration for opportunity marketplace assignments. The 2H 2025 Release:

  • Provides applicants with the flexibility to re-apply, promoting continuous engagement and inclusivity.
  • Simplifies the assignment creation process by reducing clutter and highlighting critical information, making the interface more user-friendly.
  • Allow users to format text with bold, italics, bullet points, and more, enabling clearer and more engaging communication in assignment descriptions, custom fields, and comments.

These enhancements make it easier for employees to discover growth opportunities and for managers to source talent for short-term projects, fostering a culture of continuous learning and agility.

Simplified assignment creation

People Intelligence – Career and Talent Development Insights

2H 2025 Release delivers actionable insights into employee growth and succession preparedness to stay ahead of talent gaps and leadership transitions.

  • Get better visibility into company-wide development goals, progress, and related skills with real-time, centralized analytics.
  • Empower managers to pinpoint teams with low development activity and take targeted action to drive development.
  • Make better decisions to invest in upskilling and building a future-ready talent pipeline.
  • Gain insights into succession coverage and gaps to minimize disruption to the business.

Career development planning insights

Succession planning insights

Learn more

The 2H 2025 Release of SAP SuccessFactors Career and Talent Development delivers continuous innovation to enhance career growth and succession planning capabilities.

You can discover more 2H 2025 Release innovations across the suite by checking out the release highlights brochure, overview video featuring Bianka Woelke, and the Product Release & Road Map Information page.

Learn more about SAP SuccessFactors Career and Talent Development!

entry.title: How to configure Payment to Both Carrier and Forwarding Agent in the Same Freight Order?
entry.content:
We have following requirement in the business but not able to find any configurations for the same:

Client has requirement where they want to pay Carrier for transport and one agent, which we are considering as a forwarding agent, for clearing and other charges in the same freight order. We were thinking of using service order for this case. But in public cloud we couldn't see any tab for service order like we see in on premise. There are no config as well for this.

Could you help us with this requirement?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Re: How to configure Payment to Both Carrier and Forwardi...
entry.content:
In SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, the functionality to handle service orders as seen in the on-premise version is not directly available. However, you can manage transportation services and related charges using the Transportation Management module.

For your requirement to pay both the carrier and a forwarding agent for clearing and other charges within the same freight order, you can utilize the concept of charge types in Transportation Management. Charge types can represent both independent services like base freight and dependent services like fuel surcharges or discounts.

Steps to Manage Charges:

  1. Define Charge Types: You can define charge types for different services such as base freight, loading charges, and additional services like clearing charges.

  2. Use Service Products: In SAP S/4HANA Cloud, transportation services can be modeled as service products. How to create Transportation Management based service products for a charge This allows you to represent logistical information and determine accounts for posting costs.

  3. Freight Order Configuration: Within a freight order, you can assign these charge types to represent the services procured from carriers and forwarding agents.

  4. Cost Distribution: Ensure that cost distribution is performed in the freight order to allocate costs accurately across different services.

  5. Billing and Settlement: Use the Freight Cost Allocation Document How to Bill Freight Costs to Customer in S4/HANA Cloud to manage the billing and settlement of these charges.

By configuring charge types and using service products, I imagine that could help on your currently requirement.

However, as there is no functionality available in the S/4HANA Public Cloud exactly as on prem system. To address this, I recommend submitting a feature request to SAP using the guide `##2963059 - How to Submit Feature Requests for SAP S/4 HANA Cloud Product`. By creating an Influence request, your suggestion will gain visibility among other customers, potentially accelerating the implementation of this functionality in future product releases.  

I hope this helps with your requirement! In case you have further question or further clarification, please help sharing it in this thread to us!

Regarding 4. Payment Notice/Remittance Advice. Please review  Solved: Remittance advice within S/4 Hana Public cloud - SAP Community
